testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URl "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed When User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin".....passed When Click on Login.........................................................passed Then Page should be Dashboard nopCommerce administration..................passed When User Click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Title should be Your store. Login......................................passed Then close browser..........................................................passed
